title: Hyacinth
description:
A hyacinth with purple blossoms and a green stem.

Can be used to talk about the actual flower, flowers in general, or the color purple. Can also be used in reference to springtime. May be used as part of the symbolic table setting for Nowruz, the Persian New Year.
apple_vendor_description: The hyacinth emoji on Apple devices blossoms with vibrant purple petals, each delicately sculpted with soft rounded edges and a lustrous sheen. Realistic lighting creates a sense of depth and natural beauty, making the flower appear almost tangible.  This emoji, with its rich color and elegant form, evokes feelings of spring, renewal, and fragrant beauty, making it a delightful way to convey joy and natural charm in digital conversations.
